Articles.Content:
There's one typo I didn't catch, and I also seem to have failed at making clear the context of the phrase "First Orbit of..." because despite pointing to the start/end of Dres' orbit and there being a "First Craft to Orbit..." some people on reddit thought I was referring to the first orbit of a planet by a vessel or kerbal or something ambiguous. I do suppose I could have said "First Orbit of [planet] Around Kerbol" but I couldn't bring myself to add the extra characters when I already felt things were getting crowded. Prob should have said "1 Year of..."

Was inspired by this image

Edited August 28, 2015 by Gaiiden
